mapper.sql: STAFF_ID, STAFF_NO, STAFF_NM, STAFF_KN, STAFF_ALPHABET, STAFF_SEX, STAFF_DELFLG, STAFF_COUNTRY, STAFF_BIRTHPLACE, STAFF_CLS, STAFF_COMPANY, STAFF_SALESSTATUS, STAFF_GROUP, STAFF_POST, STAFF_RMK1, STAFF_AGE, STAFF_MYNO, STAFF_PHONENO, STAFF_RESIDENCECARD, STAFF_RESTYPE, STAFF_CARDENDDT, STAFF_BIRTHDT, STAFF_POSTNO, STAFF_ADDRESS, STAFF_INDT, STAFF_OUTDT, STAFF_MAIL, STAFF_NEARESTSTATION, STAFF_RESUME, STAFF_INSURANCENO, STAFF_INSURANCETYPE, STAFF_SPECIALTY, STAFF_RMK2, STAFF_PHOTO, STAFF_EMERGENCYCALL, CUST_CRD_USR, STAFF_CRE_DT, CUST_UPD_USR, STAFF_UPD_DT, STAFF_DELDT
mapper.select:
select
from STAFF_TBL
AND STAFF_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{staffQuaryCondition.staffNm}, '%')
AND STAFF_CLS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{staffQuaryCondition.staffCls}, '%')
AND STAFF_SALESSTATUS = #{staffQuaryCondition.staffSalesstatus}
AND STAFF_DELFLG=0
ORDER BY STAFF_NO ASC LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{limit}

select COUNT(*) from STAFF_TBL
AND STAFF_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{staffQuaryCondition.staffNm}, '%')
AND STAFF_CLS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{staffQuaryCondition.staffCls}, '%')
AND STAFF_SALESSTATUS = #{staffQuaryCondition.staffSalesstatus}
AND STAFF_DELFLG=0
mapper.insert: insert into STAFF_TBL (STAFF_ID, STAFF_NO, STAFF_NM, STAFF_KN, STAFF_ALPHABET, STAFF_SEX, STAFF_DELFLG, STAFF_COUNTRY, STAFF_BIRTHPLACE, STAFF_CLS, STAFF_COMPANY, STAFF_SALESSTATUS, STAFF_GROUP, STAFF_POST, STAFF_RMK1, STAFF_AGE, STAFF_MYNO, STAFF_PHONENO, STAFF_RESIDENCECARD, STAFF_RESTYPE, STAFF_CARDENDDT, STAFF_BIRTHDT, STAFF_POSTNO, STAFF_ADDRESS, STAFF_INDT, STAFF_OUTDT, STAFF_MAIL, STAFF_NEARESTSTATION, STAFF_RESUME, STAFF_INSURANCENO, STAFF_INSURANCETYPE, STAFF_SPECIALTY, STAFF_RMK2, STAFF_PHOTO, STAFF_EMERGENCYCALL, CUST_CRD_USR, STAFF_CRE_DT, CUST_UPD_USR, STAFF_UPD_DT, STAFF_DELDT) values (#{staffId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{staffNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffKn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffAlphabet,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffSex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{staffDelflg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{staffCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffBirthplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffCls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffSalesstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffPost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffRmk1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffAge,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{staffMyno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffPhoneno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffResidencecard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffRestype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffCardenddt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{staffBirthdt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{staffPostno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffIndt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{staffOutdt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{staffMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffNeareststation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffResume,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffInsuranceno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffInsurancetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffSpecialty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffRmk2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffEmergencycall,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custCrdUsr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffCreDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{custUpdUsr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffUpdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{staffDeldt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update:
update STAFF_TBL
STAFF_NO = #{staffNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_NM = #{staffNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_KN = #{staffKn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_ALPHABET = #{staffAlphabet,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_SEX = #{staffSex,jdbcType=CHAR},
STAFF_DELFLG = #{staffDelflg,jdbcType=CHAR},
STAFF_COUNTRY = #{staffCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_BIRTHPLACE = #{staffBirthplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_CLS = #{staffCls,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_COMPANY = #{staffCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_SALESSTATUS = #{staffSalesstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_GROUP = #{staffGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_POST = #{staffPost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_RMK1 = #{staffRmk1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_AGE = #{staffAge,jdbcType=TINYINT},
STAFF_MYNO = #{staffMyno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_PHONENO = #{staffPhoneno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_RESIDENCECARD = #{staffResidencecard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_RESTYPE = #{staffRestype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_CARDENDDT = #{staffCardenddt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STAFF_BIRTHDT = #{staffBirthdt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STAFF_POSTNO = #{staffPostno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_ADDRESS = #{staffAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_INDT = #{staffIndt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STAFF_OUTDT = #{staffOutdt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STAFF_MAIL = #{staffMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_NEARESTSTATION = #{staffNeareststation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_RESUME = #{staffResume,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_INSURANCENO = #{staffInsuranceno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_INSURANCETYPE = #{staffInsurancetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_SPECIALTY = #{staffSpecialty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_RMK2 = #{staffRmk2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_PHOTO = #{staffPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_EMERGENCYCALL = #{staffEmergencycall,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_CRD_USR = #{custCrdUsr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_CRE_DT = #{staffCreDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CUST_UPD_USR = #{custUpdUsr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_UPD_DT = #{staffUpdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STAFF_DELDT = #{staffDeldt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where STAFF_ID = #{staffId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND STAFF_DELFLG=0
